required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Dermacyd Femina Delicata (Lactic Acid)- Photo Dermatological Evaluation of the Irritation and Sensitivity Potential
clinical_study.official_title: Dermatological Evaluation of the Photo Irritation and Photo Sensitivity Potential for Dermacyd Femina Delicata

brief_summary.textblock: To prove the absence of photo irritation and photo sensitivity potential of the product Dermacyd Femina Delicata.

primary_outcome.measure: The photo irritation test and the photosensitivity will be measured using UVA irradiation and evaluated according International Contact Dermatitis Research Group (ICDRG) scale.
The sensibility will be evaluated according the skin type.
